title: Amrutham Dhvitheeyam
overview: Amrutham Dhvitheeyam is a 2020 ZEE5 Telugu Original comedy series starring Harsha Vardhan, L B Sriram, Vasu, and Sivannarayana. In this sequel of Amrutham, the all-time popular Telugu sitcom, Amrutham and Anji continue to come up with creative ideas for their restaurant and fail with hilarious consequences.
